readable.content: A man has his hand on his head while a speaker is speaking . A man in a suit touches his head while another speaks at a microphone . A man is scratching his head at a meeting while a person spoke . A man wearing a suit scratches the back of his head at a meeting . a picture taken from the back of osme kind of large meetinghall .
